DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Concurrent Medication : Allowed : AZT , ddI , ddC , d4T , 3TC . Oral trimethoprim/sulfamethoxazole . Aerosolized pentamidine . Dapsone . Fluconazole . Rifabutin . Clarithromycin . Patients must : HIV seropositivity . Mean CD4 count > = 100 cells/mm3 . External anogenital condyloma acuminatum confirm biopsy , present less 1 year . NOTE : Warts anal , urethral , vaginal mucosa study . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow symptoms condition exclude : Active lesion genital herpes , skin wound , active inflammatory skin disorder area wart treat . Active medical problem sufficient hinder study compliance . Concurrent Medication : Excluded : Podofilox podophyllum resin preparation . Liquid nitrogen treatment . Interferon alpha . Trichloracetic acid . Other treatment , topical systemic , surgical ablative , know antipapilloma activity . Other investigative drug ( except d4T 3TC ) unless approve sponsor . Patients follow prior condition exclude : History untreated syphilis Bowenoid papulosis . Prior Medication : Excluded within 4 week prior study entry : Treatment anogenital wart .
